timeline.message:
Enable code scanning for vulnerabilities

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: We should do it for release PR's too right? In those case where code goes there before being ported to master
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Yep, already had that change locally.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Will this also cover the Helm template language by association of Go?
timeline.author: Nana-EC
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+name: "CodeQL"
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches: [master, release/**]
+  pull_request:
+    branches: [master]
+
+jobs:
+  analyze:
+    name: Analyze
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    strategy:
+      fail-fast: false
+      matrix:
+        language: ['go', 'java', 'javascript']

replies.bodyText: No, will only work for the rosetta PR.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
